derivation: from G4862 (συντέμνω) and the base of G5114 (συντέμνω);
strongs_def: to contract by cutting, i.e. (figuratively) do concisely (speedily)
outline:
1. to cut in pieces
  2. to cut short
  3. metaph.
    1. to dispatch briefly, execute or finish quickly
    2. to hasten
    3. a short word i.e. an expedited prophecy or decree
